title: Where in the USA in this?
description: A daily photo location guessing game.
about: Guess the location in the USA in five tries. After each guess a new photo is revealed. The color of the tile shows how close your guess was:
data: ~500,000 geo-tagged images from Wikimedia Commons. Each day, a randomly generated location is chosen along with five random photos from within 10 miles.
outro: By Russell Samora. A new puzzle is released daily at midnight, GMT.
